Here is some correctly spelled text.

My name is Geoffrey Challen, which your dictionary might not know. It's challenging.

Most dictionaries still don't think that smartphone is a word.

This wrd is intentionally misspelled.

Contractions like you'll and I'll can be tough, particularly to match with exceptions; also smartphone's.

This aoeu is also intentionally misspelled.

Let's test some non-breaking space. And the end of a sentence with smartphone. And a colon, smartphone: the future. And back to back, smartphone smartphone.
